6 FORMS

Styling and basic layout of base HTML Web Form elements.

6.1 Elements

Default styling for all common elements.

6.1.1 Text Inputs

Default styling for all types of Text Input

.disabled

disabled form elements

<input type="text" class="{$modifiers}" />

6.1.2 Select Elements

Default styling for all types of Select Element

<select>
<option>Option</option>
<option>Option</option>
<option>Option</option>
<option>Option</option>
</select>

6.1.3 Boolean Elements

Default styling for all types of Boolean Element

<div class="f-block f-block--boolean">
  <input class="fe-boolean" type="checkbox" name="checkbox_example" value="1" />
  <label for="checkbox_example">Checkbox example</label>
</div>
<div class="f-block f-block--boolean">
  <input class="fe-boolean" type="radio" name="radio_example" value="1" />
  <label for="radio_example">Radio example</label>
</div>

6.1.4 Textarea Elements

Default styling for Textarea elements

<div class="f-block f-block--textarea">
  <label>Textarea example</label>
  <textarea rows="20"></textarea>
</div>

6.1.5 Help Text

Block level help text for form controls.

A block of help text that breaks onto a new line and may extend beyond one line. 
<div class="f-block f-block--textarea">
  <label>Help text example</label>
  <input type="text" />
  <span class="help-block">A block of help text that breaks onto a new line and may extend beyond one line.</span>
</div>

6.2 Structure & Layout

Layout and arrangement of form controls.

6.2.1 Form Block

Provides clearing and spacing for individual form elements.

<div class="f-block">
  <label class="fe-label" for="inline_example">First Block</label>
  <input class="fe-control" name="for="inline_example" id="inline_example" type="text" />
</div>
<div class="f-block">
  <label class="fe-label" for="inline_example">Second Block</label>
  <input class="fe-control" name="for="inline_example" id="inline_example" type="text" />
</div>
<div class="f-block">
  <label class="fe-label" for="inline_example">Third Block</label>
  <input class="fe-control" name="for="inline_example" id="inline_example" type="text" />
</div>

6.2.2 Inline Form

Throws a block into a horiztonal arrangement with control and lable on one line

<div class="f-block f-block--inline">
  <label class="fe-label" for="inline_example">Username</label>
  <input class="fe-control" name="for="inline_example" id="inline_example" type="text" />
</div>
<div class="f-block f-block--inline">
  <label class="fe-label" for="inline_example">Password</label>
  <input class="fe-control" name="for="inline_example" id="inline_example" type="text" />
</div>

6.2.3 Prepend & Append

Prepends an element onto a form control

<div class="f-block">
  <label class="fe-label" for="inline_example">Prepend</label>
  <span class="fe-group">
    <span class="fe-prepend">
     <button class="btn" type="button">Go!</button>
    </span>
    <input class="fe-control" name="for="inline_example" id="inline_example" type="text" />
  </span>
</div>
<div class="f-block">
  <label class="fe-label" for="inline_example">Append</label>
  <span class="fe-group">
    <input class="fe-control" name="for="inline_example" id="inline_example" type="text" />
    <span class="fe-append">
     <button class="btn" type="button">Go!</button>
    </span>
  </span>
</div>
Created using kss-node and kss-node-template.
